title: Which are the character names of Bollywood actors that no one can forget? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A Himanshu Bengani :) Here are some of the most iconic/memorable roles in Hindi cinema that I can instantly recall. I'm sure there are many more I may have missed. Please add those in the comments below. I shall add them to my list. Devdas (Devdas)  Radha (Mother India)  Vijay (Pyaasa) Guru Dutt  Salim, Anarkali (MughaleAzam)  Gabbar, Thakur, Jai, Veeru, Basanti, Mausiji (Sholay)  Amar, Akbar, Anthony (Amar Akbar Anthony)  Umrao Jaan  Sahibjaan (Pakeezah) - Meena Kumari  Anand (Anand)  Ram Prasad, Bhavani Shankar (Golmaal - 1979)  Rahul (Masoom)  Mogambo, Mr India (Mr India)  Nehalata (Sadma)  Bandit Queen (Bandit Queen)  B.V Pradhan (Saraansh) - Anupam Kher  Vijay Deenanath Chauhan (Agneepath)  Raj, Simran (DDLJ)  Munnabhai, Circuit (Munnabhai franchise)  Rani (Queen) - Kangana Ranaut

The Movie, epic, Sholay left many names in our heart, and will stay forever. 1 BASANTI - Hemamalini 2. GABBAR- Amjad Khan 3. THAKUR- Sanjeev Kumar 4. VEERU - Dharmendra 5. JAY - Amitabh Bachchan Many more in the list, Mogambo - Amrish Puri (Mr. India)Mr India- Anil Kapur (Mr. India)Simran- Kajol (Dilwale Dulhaniya Le Jayenge)Vijay Dinanath Chouhan - Amitabh Bachan ( Agneepath)Raj - Raj Kapoor (Awaara)Anand - Rajesh Khanna (Anand)Radha - Nargiz (Mother India)Amar and Prem - Aamir Khan and Salman Khan ( Andaaz apna apna)Umrao Jaan - Rekha (Umrao Jaan )Devdas Mukherji - Dileep Kumar, Shahrukh Khan (Devdas- both versions)Paro - Suchitra Sen, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan (Devdas- both the versions)Bhuvan - Aamir Khan ( Lagaan)Munna - Aamir Khan (Rangeela)Geet - Kareena Kapoor (Jab We Met)Rancho- Aamir Khan ( 3Idiots)Virus - Boman Irani (3 Idiots)Chathur- Omi Vaidya (3idiots)Circuit - Arshad Warsi (Munnabhai MBBS)Murli Prasad/ Munnabhai - Sanjay Datt ( Munnabhai MBBS)PK - Aamir Khan (PK)There are many more…..Afterall, view point differs :)
